item.title: Themes and Extensions for Jupyter notebook
item.description:
I am taking the wonderful fast.ai course thought by Jermey Howard and Rachel. We use jupyter notebooks in classes and it is always nice to see how Jermey’s notebook looks.

It has few tweaks like

  • collapsible headings
  • better tables and fonts

Learnt that he uses a themes for the visual customizations and an extensions to allow collapsing of headers from his reply in forums

The theme script can be installed from jupyter-themes repo

item.title: Use Skipgrams with sklearn CountVectorizer and TfidfVectorizer
item.description:
We don’t have an implementation for skipgrams in sklearn. This post covers how to use the skipgram function in nltk with sklearn’s CountVectorizer and TfidfVectorizer

We are going to create a skipgram tokenizer that can be passed to the tokenizer parameter of the vectorizer.
